message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $9200. It's a one-time offer, and I think you'll find it's a great deal.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
I can see you're interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of a price of $9000. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $8800. Can you consider that?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $9500. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $8700. Can you consider that?

I can see you're really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $9000. It's a fair price, and I think you'll find it's a great deal. This is my final concession, so I expect you to take it.
I appreciate your final concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $8600. Can you consider that?

I've made a lot of concessions, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm thinking of a price of $9200 again, but I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'm willing to include a one-year warranty and a free consultation. This is my final offer.

I appreciate the extras you're offering, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $8500, but that's as high as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $10000.
